snippet: The captain and three other crew members of the ferry that capsized off the southwestern coast of South Korea in April were indicted on murder charges Thursday, prosecutors said.
abstract: Captain and three other crew members of South Korean ferry that capsized are indicted on murder charges.
lead_paragraph: The captain and three other crew members of the ferry that capsized off the southwestern coast of South Korea in April were indicted on murder charges Thursday, prosecutors said.

headline.main: South Korea: Murder Charges in Ferry Disaster
headline.print_headline: South Korea: Murder Charges in Ferry Disaster
